title: unexpected panic in pattern matching

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
This is the code that ICEs, as minimal as I could make it.

```
fn main() {
    let mut v = vec![1, 2, 3];

    match &v[..] {
        [1, ref n, 3] => {},
        [1, 2, 3] => {},
    }
}
```
